metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10774 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Read access violation in the isiin_keyword function in isiin.c in libbibutils.a in bibutils through 6.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash), as demonstrated by isi2xml.

criterions.comment: bibutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
